item.title: What Does It Mean When A Bird Tilts Its Head?
item.description: Birds are fascinating creatures with an array of behaviors that intrigue both enthusiasts and professionals.

item.title: Why Is My Parakeet Bobbing His Head? Parakeet Behaviors
item.description: Parakeets are small, social birds known for their lively behaviors and ability to mimic human speech.
